title: Google\Cloud\GkeMultiCloud\V1\AzureSshConfig
name: AzureSshConfig
description:
SSH configuration for Azure resources.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.gkemulticloud.v1.AzureSshConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.authorized_key
params.description: Required. The SSH public key data for VMs managed by Anthos. This accepts the authorized_keys file format used in OpenSSH according to the sshd(8) manual page.
